description: This source file provides a helper module for GPG signing operations, including signing, exporting public keys, verifying signatures, and creating detached signatures. It defines a class for handling local GPG signing within a build environment.

classes.name: LocalSigner
classes.description: Class handling local GPG signing operations such as key export, signing RPMs, detached signing, verification, and retrieving GPG version.

methods.name: export_pubkey(self, output_file, keyid, armor=True)
methods.description: Exports a GPG public key to a specified output file.

methods.name: sign_rpms(self, files, keyid, passphrase, digest, sign_chunk, fsk=None, fsk_password=None)
methods.description: Signs RPM files with specified key, passphrase, and digest algorithm.

methods.name: detach_sign(self, input_file, keyid, passphrase_file, passphrase=None, armor=True, output_suffix=None, use_sha256=False)
methods.description: Creates a detached signature for a specified input file.

methods.name: get_gpg_version(self)
methods.description: Retrieves the version of GPG installed as a tuple of integers.

ctags.name: detach_sign
ctags.pattern: /^    def detach_sign(self, input_file, keyid, passphrase_file, passphrase=None, armor=True, outpu/
ctags.signature: (self, input_file, keyid, passphrase_file, passphrase=None, armor=True, output_suffix=None, use_sha256=False)

ctags.name: sign_rpms
ctags.pattern: /^    def sign_rpms(self, files, keyid, passphrase, digest, sign_chunk, fsk=None, fsk_password=Non/
ctags.signature: (self, files, keyid, passphrase, digest, sign_chunk, fsk=None, fsk_password=None)
